verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* plains, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w places|strong="H3605"\w* near \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* coasts \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwell \w by|strong="H0413"\w* Libanus, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Hethite \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorrhite, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Chanaanite, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Pherezite, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Hevite, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*,

\w Gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* Josue \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* mind, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* resolution.

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Gabaon, \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* all \w that|strong="H0834"\w* Josue \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w and|strong="H3091"\w* Hai:

Cunningly devising \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w for|strong="H1571"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* provisions, laying old \w sacks|strong="H8242"\w* upon \w their|strong="H1992"\w* asses, \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* bottles rent \w and|strong="H8242"\w* sewed \w up|strong="H1234"\w* again,

\w And|strong="H3899"\w* very old \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w*, \w which|strong="H3899"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w show|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* age \w were|strong="H1961"\w* clouted \w with|strong="H5921"\w* patches, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* old \w garments|strong="H8008"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* leaves also, \w which|strong="H3899"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w carried|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w provisions|strong="H6720"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w*, \w were|strong="H1961"\w* hard, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* broken \w into|strong="H5921"\w* pieces:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Josue, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w then|strong="H6258"\w* abode \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* Galgal, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w We|strong="H6258"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, desiring \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* peace \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* children \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Perhaps|strong="H0194"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* which falls \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w our|strong="H7130"\w* lot; \w if|strong="H0376"\w* \w so|strong="H3427"\w*, \w we|strong="H7130"\w* \w can|strong="H0349"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* no \w league|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0859"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Josue: \w We|strong="H0587"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*. Josue \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*? \w and|strong="H0935"\w* whence \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*?

\w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w From|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fame|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* power, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorrhites \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, Sehon \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Hesebon, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Basan, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* Astaroth:

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* ancients, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* victuals \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w long|strong="H0413"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* go \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H0587"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w make|strong="H3772"\w* ye \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w league|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w leaves|strong="H3318"\w* \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w hot|strong="H2525"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w set|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*, \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* broken \w in|strong="H0413"\w* pieces, \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w being|strong="H1961"\w* exceeding old.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* bottles \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w them|strong="H1086"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w*, \w now|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* rent \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w burst|strong="H1234"\w*. \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w garments|strong="H8008"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w our|strong="H0834"\w* feet, \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w reason|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w long|strong="H7230"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w worn|strong="H1086"\w* \w out|strong="H1086"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w almost|strong="H3966"\w* consumed.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* victuals, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* consulted \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3091"\w* Josue \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3091"\w* entering into \w a|strong="H3772"\w* \w league|strong="H1285"\w* \w promised|strong="H7650"\w* \w that|strong="H1285"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w should|strong="H6213"\w* not \w be|strong="H5712"\w* slain: \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H5712"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* multitude \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H7650"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w league|strong="H1285"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* nigh, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w removed|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* camp, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* names \w of|strong="H1121"\w* which \w are|strong="H3117"\w* Gabaon, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Caphira, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Beroth, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Cariathiarim.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w common|strong="H1121"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w murmured|strong="H3885"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w We|strong="H0587"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* mill \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w lives|strong="H2421"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* saved, lest \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w be|strong="H1961"\w* stirred \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* forsworn.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w in|strong="H0413"\w* hewing \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* bringing \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. \w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*,

Josue \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Gabaonites \w and|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w would|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* impose \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H0587"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*, whereas \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*?

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w under|strong="H4480"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* \w curse|strong="H0779"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* race \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* always \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w hewers|strong="H2404"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w carriers|strong="H7579"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* unto \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w promised|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof. \w Therefore|strong="H4872"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w provided|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*. compelled \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dread \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w counsel|strong="H1697"\w*.
